author: BBC Sport
description: David Moyes resigns as manager of relegated Sunderland after one season in the job.
title: David Moyes resigns as Sunderland boss after relegation from Premier League

author: BBC Sport
description: Sunderland will only consider offers of about £30m for goalkeeper Jordan Pickford, says boss David Moyes.
title: Jordan Pickford: Sunderland will demand £30m for keeper - David Moyes

description: David Moyes ist als Trainer des AFC Sunderland zurückgetreten. Wie der Premier-League-Absteiger mitteilte, informierte Moyes die Clubverantwortlichen am Vormittag über seine Entscheidung.
title: Fußball: Trainer David Moyes verlässt Absteiger AFC Sunderland

author: Sports Staff
description: David Moyes has resigned as Sunderland manager following the Black Cats' relegation from the Premier League.  The Wearsiders finished bottom of the league and Moyes admitted after the final-day defeat at Chelsea that he would be discussing his future with the club.
title: David Moyes resigns as Sunderland boss following relegation

description: David Moyes’ final weeks as Sunderland manager were scarred by a series of furious clashes with both players and staff as he struggled to control his emotions during a dreadful ten months on Wearside.
title: David Moyes resigns as Sunderland manager without compensation after dreadful 10 months on Wearside

author: talkSPORT
description: David Moyes has resigned as manager of Sunderland following their relegation from the Premier League. Appointed last summer, Moyes failed to keep the Black Cats in the top flight, and will not remain in charge for the 2017/18 Championship campaign; he has stepped down without claiming compensation. Sunderland finished the 2016/17 season in last place in the Premier League table, claiming just six wins from 38 games, and picking up only 24 points.
title: CONFIRMED: David Moyes resigns as manager of Sunderland following relegation from Premier League

author: Joe Baiamonte
description: David Moyes admitted to Sunderland's involvement in bizarre incident
title: Chelsea And Sunderland Could Be In Trouble For Terry's 26th Minute Substitution | SPORTbible

author: FourFourTwo
description: Sunderland are looking for a new manager after David Moyes resigned on Monday.
title: Moyes resigns at Sunderland

author: FourFourTwo
description: Jordan Pickford is expected to be one of the in-demand players of the transfer window, with David Moyes suggesting he is worth £30million.
title: I have heard some derisory figures - Moyes believes Pickford is worth £30m

author: BBC Sport
description: John Terry admits his 26th-minute Chelsea substitution was his idea, with Sunderland boss David Moyes agreeing to help.
title: John Terry: Chelsea captain says 26th-minute substitution was his idea
